rukus.text: The king said, “I see seven fat cows which seven lean ones devour, and seven green ears of corn, and seven withered. O advisors, explain to me my vision if you can interpret visions.”
They said, “A confused medley of dreams, and we are not skilled in the interpretation of dreams.”
But the person who had been released, one of the two, now remembered him after a period of time and said, “I will tell you the truth of its interpretation. Bring me

“O Joseph, O person of truth, expound to us concerning the seven fat cows that the seven lean ones devour, and the seven green ears of corn and withered ones. That I may return to the people, and that they may understand.”
Joseph said, “For seven years you will diligently sow as you will, and the harvests of what you reap, you will leave in the ear, except a little of which you will eat
“Then will come after that seven dreadful years which will devour what you will have saved in anticipation for them, all except a little which you will have stored
“Then will come after that, a year in which the people will have abundant water, and in which they will use to produce.”
